info.title: SD Document Order Reason - Read (A2X)
info.description: The service contains four entities, from which Self-Billing Cockpit consumers can retrieve the order reason ID and description, retro-billing relevance of the order reason, as well as the related item type for self-billing processing.

x-sap-shortText: Read order reasons for sales and distribution (SD) documents using this synchronous inbound service

tags.name: Order Reason ID and Self-Billing Processing Indicators
Description of Self-Billing Value Item Indicator

get.summary: Reads the descriptions of all retro-billing usage indicators.
get.description: Reads the descriptions of all retro-billing usage indicators for order reasons. Depending on its use, an order reason may be irrelevant for retroactive billing or relevant for retroactive billing in a certain way.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: RetroBillingUsage
parameters.description: Use of Order Reason for Retroactive Billing

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language Key

get.summary: Reads the description of a specific retro-billing usage indicator in a specific language.
get.description: Reads the description of a specific retro-billing usage indicator in a specific language. Consumers must pass the retro-billing usage indicator (blank, "1", or "2") and language key.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads all value combinations of the order reason ID, retro-billing usage indicator, and self-billing value item indicator.
get.description: Reads all value combinations of the order reason ID, retro-billing usage indicator (blank, "1", or "2"), and self-billing value item indicator (blank or "X").
tags: Order Reason ID and Self-Billing Processing Indicators

get.summary: Reads a specific value combination of the order reason ID, retro-billing usage indicator, and self-billing value item indicator.
get.description: Reads a specific value combination of the order reason ID, retro-billing usage indicator (blank, "1", or "2"), and self-billing value item indicator (blank or "X"). Consumers must pass the order reason ID.

get.summary: Reads the descriptions of all self-billing value item indicators.
get.description: Reads the descriptions of all self-billing value item indicators. Available value item indicators represent two item types in self-billing: standard item (indicated by blank) and value item (indicated by "X").
tags: Description of Self-Billing Value Item Indicator

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_RetroBillingUsageText HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
